name: Duo Dungeon (Umbreon117)
description:
A unique dungeon crawling experience where you control two characters simultaneously!

Split into two distinct halves by breaking a magic mirror; Can you navigate two separate characters through the various dangers and puzzles of the dungeon in order to repair the mirror and become whole once more?

Keyboard Controls

Move: w/a/s/d or arrow keys

Rotate characters: q/e 

Attack: Space

Open/Close: Return

Wait In Place: ; (semicolon key)

Esc: menu

Music and Sound Attributions: 

"Lightless Dawn" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
